title: Unraveling Threat Intelligence Through the Lens of Malicious URL Campaigns
summary: The daily deluge of alerts is a sombre reality for Security Operations Centre (SOC) personnel worldwide. They are at the forefront of an organisation's cybersecurity infrastructure, and face the unenviable task of prioritising threats amongst a flood of abstruse alerts triggered by their Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) systems.
